alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Walton County through 200 PM CDT... At 136 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Crestview, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Liberty, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Fox Hill, Alpine Heights, New Harmony and Mossy Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
